summary: A small, modest shack for those who want to play the game realistically in the snowy parts of the pale.
descriptionHtml:
==================================
SNOW SHACK
==================================
This is my first mod. Feel Free to suggest improvements.

Having trouble finding a simple mod that adds a small, modest player house? Search no further! Your answer is here.

Snow Shack is a modest player house for those who wish to live a solitary life in the snowy areas of the pale.

UPDATE 1.1: REPLACED DWEMER INTERIOR WITH A FARMHOUSE INTERIOR, TWEAKED LIGHTING, TWEAKED FURNITURE.

Included:
- Cooking Stove
- Fireplace
- Tanning Rack
- Chest
- Table & Chair
- Bed Roll
- Wood Chopping Block (Outside).

This house will be fast travel ready on your map. It is a shack icon near dawnstar, called \\\"Snow Shack.

===
Installation
===
NMM:
Just download the file using NMM and activate it.

Manual:
Drag the \\\"snowshack.esp\\\" file into your /Data/ folder, and make sure it is ticked in the Skyrim data files.

==
Updating
==
Store all items from the chests at Snow Shack in your inventory, or another chest elsewhere. Travel to somewhere far away, such as inside an inn. Save the game.

Then exit the game, and replace the old \"snowshack.esp\" with the new one, or if you are using NMM, it will do it automatically for you. 

It should all be updated then. You may then put back the items you moved earlier.

===
Compatibility
===
None found, and there SHOULD be no compatibility issues at all. If there are, please let me know (I doubt there will be).

Thanks for trying out this mod, I hope you enjoy it!
author: Moony22
